messages.subject: Tests
messages.msgSnippet: Kelly said: Now that I think about it, I have no idea how I will explain the tests to our son next year. It could end up being quite traumatic. It doesn t have
messages.messageBody:
Kelly said:
Now that I think about
it, I have no idea how I will explain the tests to our son next year. It
could end up being quite traumatic.

It doesn't have to be. Just be honest. Tell him that he needs to take the
tests for reasons that you don't agree with but have to comply with. Tell
him to think of it as a game (or just imply it as kind of a game in general)
and not to worry if he doesn't get everything right. ~Eryn

==
"I dreamed I was a butterfly, flitting around in the sky;
then I awoke. Now I wonder: Am I a man who dreamt of
being a butterfuly, or am I a butterfly dreaming that I am
a man?" - Chuang Tsu
http://www.camenaworks.com/Eryn/
#24591173 ::she just is::
AIM :: Opal Fayre
